source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.
source_objects.title: Microsoft

items.title: Microsoft Project 2016 Beginner to Intermediate Course
items.headline: Claim 8.5 PDUs - The Most Convenient Way to Boost Your Confidence And Learn MS Project 2016 Inside And Out—Quickly
objectives_summary: Consolidating multiple projects.
Learn to effectively split projects into sub-projects.
How to track costs.

items.title: MS Excel Data Cross Referencing using VLOOKUP and HLOOKUP
items.headline: Mastering the use of LOOKUP'S will allow you to manipulate, extract and distribute information like never before!
objectives_summary: Internal LOOKUP Structure
Exact and Approximate Matching MEthods
Column to Column Relationships

items.title: Smart and effective notes using OneNote 2010
items.headline: Learn how to effectively use Microsoft OneNote 2010 to take notes, do research and share notes with others
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will know how to take smart notes using symbols and abbreviations.
You will know how to effectively use Microsoft OneNote 2010 to:
Organize your notes, ideas and research to get a good overview of your information

items.title: Complete Introduction to Excel Power Pivot

visible_instructors.title: Ian Littlejohn
visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.job_title: Excel Power Tools, Power BI and Google Data Studio Trainer

items.headline: Concise, yet effective course on Excel DAX, Data Models & Relationships and working with enormous data volumes
objectives_summary: Quickly learn to use Power Pivot in Excel for powerful data analysis
Work with millions of rows of data, create relationships between tables and learn the DAX formula language
Have a COMPREHENSIVE understanding of creating data models in Excel

items.title: PowerPoint 2016 Advanced
items.headline: Learn advanced techniques for create dynamic and engaging presentations in Microsoft PowerPoint 2016.
objectives_summary: Collaborate in PowerPoint
Work with Masters, Themes, and Templates
Work with Animation and Transitions

items.title: Excel 2016: Customize Excel - Save Time & Be More Productive
items.headline: Quickly learn how to customize Excel 2016 so that you don't have to waste time when creating new workbooks!
objectives_summary: Understand how to customize many Excel settings to save time.

items.title: Excel Lessons - Zero to Pro for Teachers and Office Workers
items.headline: Microsoft Excel - Learn Excel Charts, Spreadsheets, Formulas, Shortcuts, Tips & Tricks, etc.
objectives_summary: A Beginner's Guide to Microsoft Excel, Spreadsheets, Formulas, Shortcuts, Advanced Tables
Become proficient in Excel data tools like Sorting, Filtering, Data validations and Data importing
Excel by creating Pivot tables with slicers

items.title: Microsoft Excel - From Excel Beginner to Excel Expert
items.headline: Learn Pivot Tables, Formulas, Charts, Data Analysis, Dashboards, VBA, Macros & More for Excel 2010, 2013 or Excel 2016
objectives_summary: Learn the most useful functions in Excel used in business
Learn to analyse large data sets with Pivot Tables
Learn to wow your boss with great looking management dashboards

items.title: Microsoft Access VBA, Design and Advanced Methods Workshop 1
items.headline: Learn new secrets to creating awesome Microsoft Access databases and VBA coding not covered in any of my other courses!
objectives_summary: Perform several advanced Microsoft Access VBA techniques that will enable them to create more robust database systems

items.title: Microsoft 365 Getting the Most out of OneDrive
items.headline: Students will learn about Microsoft OneDrive,  cloud-based storage allowing access from any Internet connection.
objectives_summary: Access OneDrive files
Modify views and sorting
Open and save files

items.title: Excel 2016 (365) Intermediate Training Course | Office 365
items.headline: Go beyond the Excel 2016 basics. Excel 2016 is included with Microsoft Office 365
objectives_summary: This is the second of three Excel 2016 training courses and builds on the materials covered in the foundation tutorials.  Topics covered include Excel 2016 Functions and Formulas such as Time & Date Functions, Mathematical Functions, Logical Functions, Mathematical Functions, Statistical Functions, Text Functions, Financial Functions, Lookup Functions & Database Functions. Plus Named Ranges, Cell Formatting, Worksheet manipulation and Excel 2016 Templates

items.title: Excel 2016 Advanced
items.headline: Take Excel to the next level with advanced formulas, What-If Analysis tools, advanced PivotTables, Macros and much more
objectives_summary: Use Advanced IF Statements
Use Advanced Lookup Functions
Use Complex Logical and Text Functions

items.title: Outlook 2016 Advanced
items.headline: In this course, students will expand upon their existing knowledge and learn and use advanced features.
objectives_summary: Customize the Outlook Experience
Use Advanced Calendar and Task Options
Work with Rules and Automation

items.title: Excel for Accountants: Volume 1
items.headline: Learn how to complete your job tasks more quickly and build a strong foundation.
objectives_summary: Recall at least 3 shortcuts to improve your speed
State how to name a cell with the name box
Recall the special properties of tables

items.title: Beginning SharePoint 2013/ 2016 /Online (part of Office 365)
items.headline: This course will help you understand SharePoint 2013-2016/SharePoint Online and to develop SharePoint Business Solutions
objectives_summary: Share & manage documents with SharePoint 2016
Organize information with SharePoint 2016
Collaborate with their peers

items.title: Office 365 modern SharePoint sites for beginners
items.headline: SharePoint modern sites explained. All videos are a practical exercise, showing SharePoint features in action.
objectives_summary: The SharePoint sites are confusing initially. I designed this course for humans with no technical knowledge.
You will learn what a modern SharePoint site is.
You will learn how to create content-rich SharePoint site pages.
